channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 查看中国第四季度GDP增长5.2%，低于市场预期
item.description: China's economy expanded 5.2% in the fourth quarter from a year earlier, official data showed on Wednesday, missing analysts' expectations slightly but still making it possible for Beijing to meet its annual growth target.翻译:周三官方数据显示，中国第四季度经济同比增长5.2%，略低于分析师预期，但仍有可能让北京实现年度增长目标。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国第四季度GDP同比增长5.2% 低于市场预期
item.description: China's economy grew 5.2% in the fourth quarter from a year earlier, official data showed on Wednesday, missing analysts' expectations slightly but still ensuring Beijing met its annual growth target despite a shaky start to the year.翻译:周三官方数据显示，中国第四季度经济同比增长5.2%，略低于分析师预期，但尽管开局不利，但仍确保北京实现了年度增长目标。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国人口连续第二年下降引发长期增长担忧
item.description: China's population fell for a second consecutive year in 2023, as a plunging birth rate and a wave of COVID-19 deaths when strict lockdowns ended accelerated a downturn that will have profound long-term effects on the economy's growth potential.翻译:2023年，中国人口连续第二年下降，原因是出生率暴跌以及严格封锁结束后出现的一波新冠肺炎死亡潮加速了经济衰退，这将对经济增长潜力产生深远的长期影响。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国12月新房价格跌幅创近9年来最快
item.description: China's December new home prices fell at the fastest pace since February 2015, marking the sixth straight month of declines, official data showed on Wednesday, with the sector still struggling to get back on its feet due to weak confidence.翻译:周三官方数据显示，中国12月份新房价格跌幅为2015年2月以来最快，连续第六个月下跌，但由于信心疲软，该行业仍难以恢复元气。
item.author: Liangping Gao, Ryan Woo

item.title: 王毅：中方支持多哥维护主权安全
item.description: China will continue to firmly support Togo in safeguarding its sovereignty, security and development interests, China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi said while visiting the African country, according to a ministry statement on Wednesday.翻译:中国外交部长王毅在周三访问多哥时表示，中方将继续坚定支持多哥维护主权、安全、发展利益。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国第四季度GDP显示经济复苏不平衡，面临诸多挑战
item.description: China's economy likely perked up slightly in the fourth quarter, enabling the government to hit its growth target after the previous year's miss, but the outlook for 2024 remains shaky amid a protracted property slump and weak consumer confidence.翻译:中国经济可能在第四季度小幅回升，使政府能够在去年未能实现增长目标后实现增长目标，但由于房地产业长期低迷和消费者信心疲弱，2024 年的前景仍然不稳定。
item.author: Kevin Yao

item.title: 亚洲中国GDP倒计时
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 加拿大打压与中国、伊朗、俄罗斯有联系的研究人员
item.description: Canada on Tuesday clamped down on researchers affiliated with a list of mainly China-based universities to stop them working on subjects deemed sensitive or critical to Canadian national security.翻译:加拿大周二对一系列主要是中国大学的研究人员进行了取缔，以阻止他们从事被认为对加拿大国家安全敏感或至关重要的课题。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯尚未加入金砖四国——部长
item.description: Saudi Arabia has not yet officially joined the BRICs bloc of developing countries, the kingdom's minister of commerce said in a panel at the World Economic Forum in Davos on Tuesday.翻译:沙特阿拉伯商务部长周二在达沃斯世界经济论坛的一个小组中表示，沙特阿拉伯尚未正式加入发展中国家的金砖四国集团。
item.author: Pesha Magid

item.title: First Quantum 为超过 1,500 名巴拿马矿山员工提供自愿退休
item.description: First Quantum Minerals on Tuesday offered voluntary retirement to more than 1,500 employees at its key Panama mine, a day after announcing a major restructuring to conserve cash, which included suspension of dividends.翻译:第一量子矿业 (First Quantum Minerals) 周二向其巴拿马主要矿场的 1,500 多名员工提出自愿退休方案，一天前，该公司宣布进行重大重组以节省现金，其中包括暂停派息。
item.author: Divya Rajagopal

item.title: 桥水基金的詹森：市场对美联储转向和中美“冷战”过于自满
item.description: Financial markets are too complacent about risks around an expected shift in U.S. monetary policy, political uncertainty in the United States and geopolitical tensions with China, an investment chief at one of the world's biggest hedge funds said on Tuesday.翻译:全球最大对冲基金之一的投资主管周二表示，金融市场对美国货币政策预期转变、美国政治不确定性以及与中国地缘政治紧张局势等风险过于自满。
item.author: Nell Mackenzie

item.title: 摩根大通戴蒙和顶级银行家在达沃斯会见中国李克强和乌克兰泽连斯基
item.description: JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon, Bank of America CEO Brian Moynihan, Standard Chartered CEO Bill Winters and Blackstone CEO Steve Schwarzman met Chinese Premier Li Qiang on the first day of the World Economic Forum meeting on Tuesday.翻译:周二，摩根大通首席执行官杰米·戴蒙、美国银行首席执行官布莱恩·莫伊尼汉、渣打银行首席执行官比尔·温特斯和黑石集团首席执行官史蒂夫·施瓦茨曼在世界经济论坛会议的第一天会见了中国国务院总理李强。
item.author: Antoni Slodkowski, Megan Davies

item.title: 2023年人民币将取代美元成为莫斯科交易量最大的货币
item.description: The Moscow Exchange trading volume in Chinese yuan surpassed that of the U.S. dollar in 2023, the Kommersant daily reported on Tuesday, as Moscow pursues a de-dollarisation strategy in the face of Western sanctions on its financial system.翻译:据《生意人报》周二报道，随着莫斯科在西方对其金融体系实施制裁的情况下推行去美元化战略，莫斯科交易所的人民币交易量将在 2023 年超过美元。
item.author: Elena Fabrichnaya, Alexander Marrow

item.title: 迪拜环球港务集团预计从亚洲到欧洲的货物成本将更高
item.description: DP World CFO Yuvraj Narayan said on Tuesday he expected that disruptions to shipping in the Red Sea as a result of Houthi attacks on vessels would hit European consumers hardest.翻译:迪拜环球港务集团首席财务官尤夫拉吉·纳拉扬(Yuvraj Narayan)周二表示，他预计胡塞武装袭击船只造成的红海航运中断将对欧洲消费者造成最严重的打击。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早间竞价：降息猫捉老鼠的游戏
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 碧桂园任命毕马威为离岸债务重组顾问
item.description: Beleaguered property developer Country Garden said on Tuesday it has appointed KPMG Advisory (China) Ltd as its principal financial adviser for its offshore debt restructuring.翻译:陷入困境的房地产开发商碧桂园周二表示，已任命毕马威咨询（中国）有限公司为其境外债务重组的首席财务顾问。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 比亚迪首艘包船载着5000辆电动汽车起航前往欧洲-新华社
item.description: BYD's first chartered vehicle vessel has set sail from China's southern city of Shenzhen, carrying more than 5,000 electric vehicles to Europe, state media Xinhua reported on Tuesday.翻译:据官方媒体新华社周二报道，比亚迪首艘汽车包租船已从中国南方城市深圳起航，搭载 5,000 多辆电动汽车前往欧洲。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 印度选手纳加尔在墨尔本取得惊人胜利后保证获得巨额奖金
item.description: Sumit Nagal, India's top-ranked singles player, was left with less than a thousand dollars in his bank account at one point last year so it was no surprise he was beaming on Tuesday after ensuring a bumper payday at the Australian Open.翻译:印度排名第一的单打选手苏米特·纳加尔(Sumit Nagal)去年的银行账户里曾一度只剩下不到千美元，因此在澳大利亚网球公开赛上确保获得丰厚发薪日后，他周二的笑容也就不足为奇了。
item.author: Shrivathsa Sridhar

item.title: 达沃斯 - 中国总理李克强：2023年中国经济增长预计为5.2%
item.description: Chinese Premier Li Qiang said on Tuesday the Chinese economy had rebounded and moved upward, and was estimated to have grown around 5.2% in 2023, above the official target of around 5%.翻译:中国国务院总理李强周二表示，中国经济已经反弹上行，预计2023年增长5.2%左右，高于5%左右的官方目标。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国前国家主席之子出任副部长
item.description: Hu Haifeng, son of former Chinese President Hu Jintao, was appointed on Tuesday by the cabinet as a vice minister of civil affairs, making a leap into the senior ranks of the central government from a small city in an eastern province.翻译:中国前国家主席胡锦涛之子胡海峰周二被内阁任命为民政部副部长，从东部省份的一个小城市跃升为中央政府高层。
item.author: Reuters
